description:
The spy who shot meâ„¢ is a comedy retro FPS inspired by classic shooters of the 90s.. Take the roll of super spy Agent7! As he fights against the evil S.C.U.M.

Features :
-> Retro fps style fast gameplay
-> Spy/Parody humour
-> Hordes of enemies to combat
-> Unique run and gun gameplay
-> Vehicle action
-> Weapon Mods
-> Lovely pointy polygons
name: The Spy Who Shot Me
